Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/25th-31st
ShortDescription: SB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are rerouted via Columbus, Roosevelt, Michigan, 31st & Lake Shore drive due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/25th-31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, Roosevelt, Michigan, 31st and Lake Shore drive due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/25th-31st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
